rev.desc.rev.desc: Support attaching corporate image in the notification html email templates
Append htmltemplates tag for notify email
AGMRQ10H58336
The Send Mail action needs to be recorded as part of the record it was sent from
Add Group Email in Panel: set.up.message.assign
Remove Fax and Page functions, delete panel send.fax.msg & check.option
Feature for HTML Email Notification
Change new format to email.notify. (start panel)
Reset the local and reference variables. (display panel)
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
BETA1062
changed expression on get.text.msg panel from:
if (not null($user.text.save)) then (text in $ml=$user.text.save)
to
if (not null($user.text.save) and $L.action~="clear") then (text in $ml=$user.text.save)
This way the text field will only get set back to the original value when the user is not trying to clear the form.
Modified to use the correct format when not coming from a related record.
Replaced rio panels get.text.msg.rio.t and get.text.msg.rio.g with a display panel.
Added balloon help messages to rio panel.
Star Team: modified to call check.emails before denull.user.array so that the recipient list is checked before the mail is scheduled.
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
added panel check.emails to check if users have an email address before mail is sent.
Modified the application "notify" to accept a format for problem and probsummary records as well as for all others.
Changed to use problem record if that is passed in. Removes select on probsummary.
scmsg
Change to allow all files to be sent, not just three.
No changes made, recompile only.
Added an entry on check.file to continue processing of device files.
Changed to call the us.gen.print.format application so that the format will be modified based on the length of arrays.
Fixed the condition for the validate.assign exit on the decide.users.assign panel. Should be option()=2.
Modified check.file to include an exit for cm3(r/t) files and created set.cm3.record to set the format and record values (Problem #98229).

This way the text field will only get set back to the original value when the user is not trying to clear the form.

Changed to call the us.gen.print.format application so that the format will be modified based on the length of arrays.
Fixed the condition for the validate.assign exit on the decide.users.assign panel. Should be option()=2.
Modified check.file to include an exit for cm3(r/t) files and created set.cm3.record to set the format and record values (Problem #98229).
